articles.title: FM Speaks DPRK Has All Means and Methods to Defend Itself
articles.content:
FM Speaks DPRK Has All Means and Methods to Defend Itself
 Pyongyang, August 18 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the DPRK Foreign Ministry Wednesday gave the following answer to a question put by KCNA as regards the U.S-south Korea Ulji Freedom Guardian joint military exercises now under way in south Korea:
					 The U.S. and the south Korean puppet authorities kicked off UFG, the largest-ever joint military exercises to attain an unprecedentedly belligerent goal, on August 16. The all-round joint military exercises being staged across south Korea in the wake of the provocative war maneuvers in the East and West Seas of Korea in less than one month are the dangerous military provocations to ignite a nuclear war on the Korean Peninsula at any cost.
					
					 These war maneuvers are a wanton violation of the Armistice Agreement and diametrically run counter to the presidential statement of the UNSC dated July 9, 2010 which calls for settling the pending issues on the Korean Peninsula through dialogue and negotiations in a peaceful manner.
					
					 Such ceaseless military provocations being perpetrated in utter disregard of the concern of the international community about the tensions running high in the Korean Peninsula and the region go to clearly prove that the U.S. is, indeed, the arch criminal threatening and wrecking the global peace and security.
					
					 The warmongers are so reckless as to dig their own graves.
					
					 The DPRK is ready both for dialogue and war and has all means and methods to defend itself.
					
					 The prevailing situation makes the DPRK more keenly feel the validity and vitality of the Songun politics.
					
					 The U.S. and the south Korean authorities should understand that there is a critical point in the tension, too, and should not calculate they can evade the blame for the explosive situation.

articles.title: NPCK Blasts US and S. Korean Warmongers' UFG
articles.content:
NPCK Blasts US and S. Korean Warmongers' UFG 
Pyongyang, August 18 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the National Peace Committee of Korea released the following statement Wednesday to condemn the U.S. and the puppet group of south Korea for having launched the provocative Ulji Freedom Guardian joint military exercises, defying the unanimous protest and denunciation from Koreans and other peace-loving people of the world:
					Involved in the exercises that kicked off on August 16 and last till August 26 are at least 30,000 U.S. troops, treble those mobilized in the past exercises, more than 56,000 puppet troops and over 400 000 civilians from more than 4,000 organs including puppet central and local self-governing bodies.
					
					  UFG now being staged by the U.S. and the south Korean puppet group across south Korea in the wake of the DPRK-targeted war saber-rattling waged in the East and West Seas of Korea under the pretext of the  warship sinking case clearly proves how mad they have gone in the war moves.
					
					 UFG is a nuclear test war as large-scale modern war means and troops are involved there and live shells are being used under the simulated conditions of an actual war according to the operational scenario for mounting a preemptive attack on the DPRK
					
					 This notwithstanding, the puppet group is letting loose such ridiculous outbursts that the exercises are aimed to "deter a war" and "ensure peace" and the like.
					
					 The group is talking about "deterring a war" and "preserving peace" after turning the whole of south Korea into theatres of war maneuvers aimed to do harm to fellow countrymen in league with outsiders. This is nothing but sheer sophism. 
					
					 The DPRK will clearly teach the warmongers that the DPRK-targeted war maneuvers will get them nowhere and bring only self-destruction.
					
					 The army and people of the DPRK will never remain an on-looker to the warmongers' military provocation and war moves but deal unpredictable severe blows at the enemy strongholds any moment and from any place as they had already clarified.

articles.title: Iron Foundry and Compressor Shop Go Operational
articles.content:
Iron Foundry and Compressor Shop Go Operational 
 Pyongyang, August 18 (KCNA) -- The Songun Iron Foundry and the Songun Compressor Shop of the Ryongsong Machine Complex went into operation with due ceremony on Tuesday.
					 The completion of the foundry where all the production processes ranging from feed of raw materials to mixing, moulding, melting and desanding are computerized and the shop furnished with CNC-based equipment made it possible for the complex to effect a radical turn in casting iron and producing compressors as a leading large-size machine producer.
					
					 It also made it possible to completely free workers in the casting field from hard and difficult labor and ensure the highest level of cultured practice in production while significantly cutting down manpower and the consumption of electricity.
					
					 Present at the ceremony were President of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly Kim Yong Nam, Vice-Premiers Kim Rak Hui, Jon Ha Chol, Kang Nung Su, Pak Su Gil, Jo Pyong Ju and Han Kwang Bok, officials concerned and officials and employees of the complex.
					
					Thanks sent by General Secretary Kim Jong Il to the officials and workers of the complex who rendered devoted services for the building of the above-said establishments were conveyed there.
					
					 Kwak Pom Gi, chief secretary of the South Hamgyong Provincial Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, made an address at the ceremony.

articles.title: Meeting Marks Anniversary of DPRK-Vietnam Association
articles.content:
Meeting Marks Anniversary of DPRK-Vietnam Association
 Pyongyang, August 18 (KCNA) -- A meeting was held at the Taedonggang Diplomatic Corps Club on Wednesday to commemorate the 45th anniversary of the formation of the DPRK-Vietnam Friendship Association and the Vietnam-DPRK Friendship Association.
					 Present there on invitation were Ambassador Le Van Cu and staff members of the Vietnamese embassy here.
					
					 Jon Yong Jin, vice-chairman of the Korean Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries who is chairman of the DPRK-Vietnam Friendship Association, members of the association and working people in the city of Pyongyang were on hand.
					
					 Jon noted in his speech at the meeting that over the past 45 years the associations have strengthened visits and cooperation, inspiringly encouraging the peoples of the DPRK and Vietnam in their joint struggle.
					
					He stressed that the friendly relations between the two countries provided by President Kim Il Sung together with President Ho Chi Minh have favorably developed in different fields under the deep care of General Secretary Kim Jong Il and General Secretary Nong Duc Manh.
					
					 He expressed belief that the associations would make contribution to strengthening the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries in the future, too.
					
					 Le Van Cu said that the historic meeting between Nong Duc Manh and Kim Jong Il in Pyongyang in 2007 marked an important event in developing the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries on a higher stage.
					
					 He expressed thanks on behalf of the Vietnamese party, government and people to the Korean party, government and people for the support and encouragement they rendered to the Vietnamese people's anti-U.S. struggle for national salvation and their socialist construction in the past.
					
					 The Vietnamese party, government and people set store by the friendly and cooperative relations with the Korean party, government and people and will strive to develop them, the ambassador declared.
					
					 After the meeting a friendly gathering took place at the DPRK-Vietnam Friendship Kyongsang Kindergarten.

articles.title: 6.15 North Committee Blasts Attempt to Arrest Rev. Han Sang Ryol
articles.content:
6.15 North Committee Blasts Attempt to Arrest Rev. Han Sang Ryol
 Pyongyang, August 18 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the North Side Committee for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration Wednesday released a statement in connection with the fact that  Rev. Han Sang Ryol, a pro-reunification champion of south Korea, is expected to go back to the area of the south through Panmunjom on August 20.
					 The statement said:
					
					 Rev. Han's visit to the northern half of Korea on the occasion of the 10th anniversary of the June 15 joint declaration was a revelation of his resolute will to instill into the fellow countrymen the ardent patriotic desire for achieving reunification in the spirit of the June 15 joint declaration and give continuity to the trend of the independent reunification even at the cost of his life.
					
					 His determination to visit the northern half of Korea and his patriotic action to realize it are warmly supported by all Koreans as it was a just and righteous act to preserve and implement the joint declaration and achieve national reconciliation and reunification.
					
					 Nevertheless, the south Korean authorities issued even a "warrant of arrest," blustering that they would arrest and punish him on charges of the violation of the notorious "National Security Law" when he comes back. They are resorting to such dastardly farce as setting in motion ultra-right conservative gangsters to let loose a spate of vituperations against him.
					
					 Worse still, they let the south Korean Red Cross unhesitatingly make inhuman remarks that it would not accept the return of Rev. Han to the area of the south.
					
					 The North Side Committee for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration bitterly denounces with burning national resentment the Lee Myung Bak group's attempt at the unreasonable fascist suppression of Rev. Han as an unpardonable criminal act of ruthlessly trampling down upon the faith and conscience of a religionist desirous of promoting national concord and peace and the freedom and right to conduct his activities for reunification.
					
					 The Lee Myung Bak group's attempt at the fascist suppression of even the pro-reunification champion who visited the north is an unpardonable treacherous act of allowing treachery to prevail over patriotism.
					
					 The south Korean authorities should stop at once the unreasonable suppression of Rev. Han and in case they arrest him, they will not be able to escape strong protest and condemnation from the public at home and abroad.

articles.title: Rev. Han San Ryol Meets Media Persons
articles.content:
Rev. Han San Ryol Meets Media Persons
 Pyongyang, August 18 (KCNA) -- Rev. Han Sang Ryol, a pro-reunification champion of south Korea, met with media persons at the People's Palace of Culture on Wednesday in connection with his going back to the area of the south at the end of his stay here.
					 Present there were media persons in Pyongyang and foreign correspondents.
					
					 Members of the North Side Committee for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration and those of the north headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification and the Pan-national Alliance of Youth and Students for Korea's Reunification were also present as observers. 
					
					 Rev. Han Sang Ryol said that he visited many parts of the north as an envoy of reconciliation and peaceful reunification tasked to preserve the June 15 joint declaration. 
					
					 I have visited the north at least 40 times but never has there been sufficient time to meet fellow countrymen and get deep understanding of the reality as this time, he added.
					
					 He urged the chief executive of south Korea to stop depending on foreign forces, roll back his hostile policy toward the DPRK and make a decision to return to the spirit of the June 15 joint declaration. 
					
					 He extended thanks to Koreans in different countries and regions for sending letters of warm encouragement and consolation. 
					
					 Noting that he would pass through Panmunjom a few days later, he stated as follows:
					
					 I will go back to the south wearing the Korean overcoat of Rev. Mun Ik Hwan with a Korean Peninsula flag round my waist just as I did when coming to the north. 
					
					 I will move ahead, making a bow after every step and praying for one Korea after every step and shouting "Long live the achievement of reunification and peace in the spirit of By our nation itself!".
					
					 He answered the questions raised by reporters of the Central Broadcasting Committee of Korea, Minju Joson, the Choson Sinbo Company under the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan, the Xinhua News Agency of China and ITAR-TASS of Russia.

articles.title: Foreign Diplomats Visit Revolutionary Museum
articles.content:
Foreign Diplomats Visit Revolutionary Museum
						
 Pyongyang, August 18 (KCNA) -- The economic and commercial councilors corps here visited the Revolutionary Museum of the Ministry of the People's Armed Forces on Wednesday on the occasion of the 50th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's start of the Songun revolutionary leadership.
					 Being briefed on the fact that Kim Jong Il has built the Korean People's Army into the revolutionary strong army of Mt. Paektu with his original Songun leadership, the guests looked around historic relics on display at the museum.

articles.title: Film Show Arranged for Military Attaches Corps
articles.content:
Film Show Arranged for Military Attaches Corps
Pyongyang, August 18 (KCNA) -- The Ministry of the People's Armed Forces arranged a film show for the military attaches corps here on Wednesday on the occasion of the 50th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's start of the Songun revolutionary leadership.
					 Present there on invitation were members of the corps.
					
					 General officers and other officers of the Korean People's Army were on hand.
					
					 The participants watched "Providing a Great Turn with the Songun Revolutionary Leadership", a Korean documentary film on the undying exploits of Kim Jong Il who turned the "Arduous March" into a march toward paradise, taking the lead in the struggle to brave all trials and difficulties.

articles.title: Architectural Design Exhibition Held
articles.content:
Architectural Design Exhibition Held
 Pyongyang, August 18 (KCNA) -- An architectural design exhibition took place in Hamhung from August 13 to 18.
					 It brought together architects and construction technicians and working people in the fields of science, education, etc. in Pyongyang and various provinces, cities and counties.
					
					 Displayed at the exhibition hall were more than 160 architectural designs well received at the recent May 21 architectural festival.
					
					 Drawing the attention of visitors were designs for the E-Library of Hamhung University of Chemical Engineering, indoor soccer stadium, the layout of the Majon Recreation Ground, etc.

articles.title: 10-day Film Show Opens
articles.content:
10-day Film Show Opens
Pyongyang, August 18 (KCNA) -- A 10-day film show was opened with due ceremony at the People's Palace of Culture on Wednesday to celebrate the 50th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's start of the Songun revolutionary leadership.
					 To be screened in this period are documentaries "The Fatherly Leader with Anti-Japanese Revolutionary Fighters", "Great Succession", "Under the Guidance of the Great Brilliant Commander" (series) and others.
					
					 Cinema-goers will watch feature films "Lovely Sunshine" (Part 1), "A White Gem" (Parts 1 and 2), "Soldier's Appearance", "A Day of Training" and "Wives of Officers."
					
					 Present at the opening ceremony were Kim Ki Nam, secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, officials concerned, creators and artistes in the field of movie industry and working people in Pyongyang.
					
					 Kim Ki Nam in his opening speech referred to the fact that Kim Jong Il, creditable successor to the cause of the Songun revolution started by President Kim Il Sung, has strengthened the revolutionary ranks in every way, defended the sovereignty and dignity of the nation and ushered in a new era of building a rich and powerful country on this land.
					
					 At the end of the ceremony the participants watched a documentary "Providing a Great Turn with the Songun Revolutionary Leadership." 
					
					 A similar event took place in each province on the same day.

articles.title: New Postage Stamps Issued
articles.content:
New Postage Stamps Issued
Pyongyang, August 18 (KCNA) -- New stamps (a souvenir sheet, a sheetlet and an individual stamp) have been issued by the State Stamp Bureau of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea with the approach of the 50th anniversary of Kim Jong Il's start of Songun revolutionary leadership.
					 Seen in the upper part of the stamps are such inscriptions as "In commemoration of the 50th anniversary of Kim Jong Il's start of the Songun revolutionary leadership" and "Juche 49 (1960)-Juche 99 (2010)".
					
					The souvenir sheet contains a Korean painting, "Snowstorm of Mt. Paektu", portraying General Secretary Kim Jong Il opening up a new era of the revolutionary cause of Juche with Songun politics.
					
					 Printed in the sheetlet are some art works showing his Songun-based revolutionary activities against the background of the Supreme Commander flag and the words and notation of the song "We Will Defend the Headquarters of Revolution with Our Lives".
					
					 An individual stamp reflects the strong will of the Korean people to build a thriving nation on this land without fail under the leadership of Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: "Among the People" Vol. 90 Off Press
articles.content:
"Among the People" Vol. 90 Off Press
 Pyongyang, August 18 (KCNA) -- A collection of reminiscences "Among the People" Vol. 90 was brought out in the DPRK.
					 The book contains 19 reminiscences telling about the outstanding leadership ability, immortal exploits and noble virtues of President Kim Il Sung. 
					
					 Reminiscences such as "Until inaugural congress of the party" and "The unforgettable story about the situation right after party founding" deal with the great exploits the President performed by successfully accomplishing the historic cause of founding the Party under the complicated situation after the liberation of Korea and providing wise leadership over the work to make sure that the Workers' Party of Korea creditably fulfilled its mission as a political staff steering the building of a new country from the very day of its founding.
					
					 "Saying that our working class can do anything if they have a will" and "Helping farmers find key to increasing grain production" and other reminiscences tell stories about the President who laid a foundation for developing the machine-building industry and walked along roads between fields all his life.
					
					 The book also contains reminiscences dealing with the facts that the President taught all officials to work, placing the interests of the people above everything and initiated the work to erect the first monument on the theme of the revolutionary traditions and saw to it that it was successfully completed. 
					
					 Contained in the book are reminiscences "'You should hold Comrade Kim Jong Il in high esteem'" reflecting the noble intention of the President who earnestly called for carrying forward and accomplishing the revolutionary cause of Juche started on Mt. Paektu generation after generation under the leadership of Kim Jong Il. 
					
					 The book has reminiscences "Deep care shown for a foreign figure" dealing with the profound loving care shown by the President for a famous Cuban female lawyer.

articles.title: More Factories Undergo Technical Updating
articles.content:
More Factories Undergo Technical Updating
 Pyongyang, August 18 (KCNA) -- More and more industrial establishments have been updated on a CNC (computer numerical control) basis in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
					 The Hwanghae Iron and Steel Complex has succeeded in applying the CNC technology to the electrode control system of a large-sized UHP electric arc furnace in the steel workshop, a great progress in putting the country's metallurgical industry on a Juche-oriented and modern basis.
					
					 It has made a general control program and solved some technological problems to economize electrodes and electricity and increase steel production.
					
					 The Sungri Motor Complex has equipped the large accessories processing workshop and other production processes with tens of CNC lathes.The Ryangchaek Bearing Factory has remodeled existing equipment to suit CNC technology.
					
					 The Pyongyang Sock Factory has completed a unified control system and the Kilju Pulp Mill, Samjiyon Soy and Bean Paste Factory, Taehongdan Potato Processing Factory and other light industry factories throughout the country have made headway in putting their production processes on a CNC basis with the help of scientists and technicians from the State Academy of Sciences and other scientific institutions.

articles.title: US Moves for MD under Fire
articles.content:
US Moves for MD under Fire
 Pyongyang, August 18 (KCNA) -- The U.S. recent negotiations on setting up an X band radar system in Bulgaria and other countries are pushed forward at a final phase and this system is expected to go operational from next year, according to press reports. 
					 Meanwhile, the U.S. is contemplating building the missile defense system and "Aegis" system in Romania through two phases by 2015 and in Poland through three phases by 2018.  
					
					 Rodong Sinmun Wednesday observes in a signed commentary in this regard:
					
					 The U.S. intensified moves for MD are blatant challenge to the desire of humankind for peace and criminal acts of seriously threatening and disturbing the world peace and security. 
					
					 Having already built up a MD network in Northeast Asia including the vicinity of the Korean Peninsula and Japan, the U.S. seeks to build the same network in Europe. 
					
					 By completing the building of missile shields in Southern Europe the U.S. seeks to cover the whole of Europe with a network of interceptor missiles. 
					
					 It is the scenario of the U.S. to push forward the building of missile shields in Northeast Asia and Europe and make them cover the whole world. 
					
					 What should not be overlooked is that the U.S. persistent moves for MD are sparking off a global arms race.
					
					 The DPRK has repeatedly warned that the moves stepped up by the U.S. to build missile shields in the vicinity of the Korean Peninsula amount to hostile acts against the DPRK and a grave threat to it. 
					
					 Nevertheless, the U.S. is persistently intensifying those moves targeted against the DPRK.
					
					 It is as clear as noonday that the U.S. reckless anachronistic moves will adversely affect the efforts to preserve world peace. 
					
					 The U.S. will be held wholly accountable for the ensuing serious consequences.

articles.title: US Loud-mouthed "Pacific State" Snubbed
articles.content:
US Loud-mouthed "Pacific State" Snubbed
 Pyongyang, August 18 (KCNA) -- The United States' loud-mouthed "Pacific state" is nothing but a watchword for aggression and plunder to put Asia under its domination. 
					 Rodong Sinmun Wednesday observes this in a signed article. 
					
					 The U.S. loud-mouthed "Pacific state" reveals its intention not only to deeply interfere in the affairs of the Pacific but persistently to pursue its wild ambition for dominating the region, claiming to be "a Pacific state, the article notes, and goes on:
					
					 There is no reason to regard the U.S. as a Pacific state and an Asian country in the light of its geographical location, race, manners and customs, skin color and so on. 
					
					 The U.S. ruling quarters are becoming evermore vociferous in asserting that the U.S. is "a Pacific state" in a bid to justify its interference in the affairs of the Asia-Pacific region and thus tighten its domination and control over this region. 
					
					 The U.S. seeks to put the region under its control militarily, to begin with. To this end, huge U.S. forces are forward-deployed in the region. 
					
					 The U.S. is also busy knocking a new military bloc into shape in an effort to establish a military control and command over Asia. As part of its moves the formation of the triangular military alliance involving the U.S., Japan and south Korea is being facilitated. 
					
					 The main thrust of the U.S. imperialists' Asia-Pacific strategy is to put Northeast Asia under its domination. Its keynote is to retain their grip on south Korea, ignite a new war of aggression against the DPRK and thus put the whole of Korea under their domination.
					
					 It is the scenario of the U.S. imperialists to seize the DPRK by force of arms by using south Korea as a forward base and, furthermore, escalate their aggression and plunder of other countries. 
					
					 Their Asia-Pacific strategy is one of strength and the DPRK is its main target, concludes the article.

articles.title: US Not Qualified to Talk about Human Rights
articles.content:
US Not Qualified to Talk about Human Rights
 Pyongyang, August 18 (KCNA) -- The Helsinki Human Rights Fund which has pursued inquiry into the issue of existence of U.S. secret prisons disclosed recently a new document exposing the fact that the CIA has operated a secret prison in Poland. 
					 Minju Joson Wednesday observes in a signed commentary in this regard:
					
					 The recent disclosure provided another irrefutable material evidence proving the fact that the U.S. abused rights of prisoners after setting up secret prisons in East European countries.
					
					 There are a series of material evidence proving that U.S. secret prisons actually existed and prisoners were maltreated there, but it has never admitted the facts. This is a mockery and insult to the human rights. 
					
					 The U.S. is more talkative about human rights than any others though it has such poor human rights record, the commentary notes, and goes on: 
					
					 The U.S. is apt to advise other countries over their "human rights" issues, behaving as if it were an "international human rights judge" and "inspector." Shortly ago, the U.S. released a report on human rights to pull up other countries over human rights records. 
					
					 The U.S. has neither face nor qualification to talk about someone's human rights. 
					
					 The U.S. would be well advised to take pain to improve its poor human rights record before taking issue with other countries' human right situation. 
					
					 If the U.S. is truly interested in guaranteeing human rights, it should open the existence of its secret prisons in different parts of the world and human rights abuses committed by it there to the international community and severely punish those responsible for them.

articles.title: Anniversary of Kim Il Sung's Work Observed
articles.content:
Anniversary of Kim Il Sung's Work Observed
						
 Pyongyang, August 18 (KCNA) -- President Kim Il Sung made sure that the Pan-National Rally for peace and reunification of the country to be held in Panmunjom by delegates from the north and the south of Korea and overseas for the first time in the history of national division on the occasion of August 15, Juche 79 (1990) provided a historical occasion of achieving the great unity of the whole nation. He met with the delegates on August 18 and made public his work "Let the Entire Nation Unite and Hasten the Reunification of the Country".
					 The work clarifies the issue of firmly adhering to the three principles--independence, peaceful reunification and great national unity--, the issue of founding the Democratic Federal Republic of Koryo on the basis of the three principles of national reunification, not copying other's style in solving the issue of reunification, the issue of leading all Koreans to form a broad-based united front and struggling, united close around it and other matters.
					
					 Rodong Sinmun Wednesday says this in a signed article.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 The work which fully reflects the earnest instructions of the President on reunifying the country by the concerted efforts of all Koreans serves as ever as a banner instilling the patriotic spirit into them and guaranteeing the victory in the cause of great national unity.
					
					General Secretary Kim Jong Il formulated the three principles of national reunification, the 10-point programme of the great unity of the whole nation and the proposal for founding the Democratic Federal Republic of Koryo set forth by the President as the three charters for national reunification and has wisely led the struggle for accomplishing the cause of national reunification through the great unity of the nation on the basis of the three charters.
					
					 The adoption of the historic June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration, a programme for implementing it, means an inheritance of the President's idea of national reunification and leadership over the struggle to materialize it and its brilliant embodiment.
					
					 All the fellow countrymen in the north and the south and overseas should firmly unite under the patriotic banner, the banner of the north-south joint declaration, and bring about national reunification as early as possible, concludes the article.

articles.title: Japanese Authorities' Hostile Policy toward DPRK Assailed
articles.content:
Japanese Authorities' Hostile Policy toward DPRK Assailed
 Pyongyang, August 18 (KCNA) -- Progressive organizations of south Korea and Japan held a seminar in Seoul on August 14 on the occasion of the centenary of the Japanese imperialists' fabrication of the brigandish "Korea-Japan Annexation Treaty." They accused the Japanese authorities of their vicious hostile policy toward the DPRK.
					 Speeches were made by Kang Jong Gu, director of the Institute for Peaceful Unification Studies of south Korea, and Kenju Watanabe, co-representative of the National Network of the Japan-South Korea People's Solidarity, and others at the seminar.
					
					 The speakers accused Japanese media of turning away from Japan's blood-stained history of aggression against Korea, whitewashing the wars of aggression launched by Japan and giving wide publicity to them.
					
					 Japan is obliged not only to redeem the crimes it committed during the past colonial rule over Korea but to own the responsibility for the division of the Korean Peninsula, they held.
					
					 We cannot but be disillusioned with Japan escalating the anti-DPRK smear campaign under the pretext of tensions on the Korean Peninsula running high over the "Cheonan" warship sinking case, the speakers said, lashing out at the Japanese authorities for pursuing the reactionary policy as evidenced by the participation of troops of the "Self-Defense Forces" in the U.S.-south Korea joint war exercises and the exclusion of Korean schools from the tuition-waiver program for senior high schools.
					
					 Dismissing such actions as absolutely unpardonable acts, they urged the Japanese government to make sincere apology and reparation to the Korean nation for Japan's past crimes and come out for peace in the Korean Peninsula and the rest of Northeast Asia.
					
					 108 women religionists of south Korea released a declaration on August 13 demanding apology and reparation for the sexual slavery enforced by the Japanese imperialists in the past.

articles.title: Peace on the Korean Peninsula Called for in S. Korea
articles.content:
Peace on the Korean Peninsula Called for in S. Korea
Pyongyang, August 18 (KCNA) -- An "August 15 meeting for probing the truth behind 'Cheonan' case and ensuring peace on the Korean Peninsula" was held in Seoul on August 15, the 65th anniversary of Korea's liberation.
					Present there were at least 5,000 members of more than 30 political parties and organizations including the Solidarity for Progress, the Confederation of Trade Unions and the Democratic Labor Party.
					
					 Speakers said at the meeting that this year marks the centenary of the Japanese imperialists' fabrication of the "Korea-Japan Annexation Treaty" and the 65th anniversary of Japan's defeat, denouncing Japan for still refusing to redress its past crimes.
					
					 It is intolerable that the Lee Myung Bak regime, while persistently pursuing the policy of confrontation with the DPRK, linked the "Cheonan" sinking case to the DPRK and has staged ceaseless war exercises in league with the U.S., they held.
					
					 They urged the U.S. and the present regime of south Korea to immediately stop large-scale joint military exercises they kicked off under the pretext of the warship case and opt for dialogue and cooperation for peace on the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 They called on the people from all walks of life to turn out in the struggle, aware that reunification is the only way out for them.
					
					 The participants held a ceremony of hoisting a large Korean Peninsula flag at the Seoul Railway Station plaza.
					
					 Read out at the meeting was a joint declaration for peace in the Korean Peninsula and the rest of Northeast Asia issued by peace-loving and progressive organizations of south Korea and Japan.
					
					 The declaration urged the Japanese authorities to make apology and reparation for Japan's past crimes and adopt a Diet resolution and issue the Japanese government statement concerning them.
					
					 It urged the Japanese authorities to normalize the relations with the DPRK as early as possible in the spirit of the DPRK-Japan Pyongyang Declaration and the south Korean authorities to opt for implementing the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration.
					
					 Meanwhile, civic and social organizations of south Korea held a rally in Seoul on the same day demanding that the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet warmongers stop joint war maneuvers and the U.S. conclude a peace treaty.

articles.title: Punishment of Group of Traitors Urged in S. Korea
articles.content:
Punishment of Group of Traitors Urged in S. Korea
Pyongyang, August 18 (KCNA) -- At least 1,000 representatives of student organizations from across south Korea including the Federation of University Students in the 21st Century, the Youth and Students Solidarity for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration, the Students Representatives Council for Democracy, Independence and Reunification and the Students Committee of the Democratic Labor Party held a "cultural event of students for probing the truth behind the 'Cheonan' case and ensuring peace on the Korean Peninsula" in Seoul on August 14.
					 Speakers recalled that all student organizations formed groups of the grand march for reunification and have staged separate actions for peace against war since July 31, stressing the need for students to carry forward the struggle to put an end to outsiders' interference and achieve independent reunification.
					
					 The south-north relations were brought to a collapse after the emergence of the Lee Myung Bak regime and the situation on the Korean Peninsula is so tense that a war may break out any moment, they deplored.
					
					 The implementation of the June 15 joint declaration, a landmark of peaceful reunification, paves the way for settling the grave situation, they held, calling on the students to stage united actions.
					
					 They declared that they would wage an unflinching struggle to punish the Lee regime and thus bring peace to the peninsula.

articles.title: Students Demonstration Staged in Seoul
articles.content:
Students Demonstration Staged in Seoul
 Pyongyang, August 18 (KCNA) -- South Korean students staged a demonstration in Seoul on August 15 in protest against the puppet group's policy of escalating confrontation with the DPRK.
					 They accused the puppet warmongers of staging anti-DPRK war exercises, obsessed by confrontation with the DPRK, chanting slogans "Make switchover in hard-line policy toward the north!" and "Fire Ryu Myong Hwan!".
					
					 The puppet police perpetrated such fascist action as walking away all the demonstrators that day.

articles.title: Songun Politics of DPRK Praised by Foreigners
articles.content:
Songun Politics of DPRK Praised by Foreigners
Pyongyang, August 18 (KCNA) -- Personages of Nigeria and Portugal released statements on Aug. 9 on the occasion of the 50th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's start of the Songun revolutionary leadership.
					 M. M. Alhassan, chairman of the Nigerian National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea, said that the Songun politics in the DPRK serves as a treasured sword safeguarding the destiny of the country and the nation and guaranteeing the building of a thriving nation.
					
					 He extended support to the Korean people in their struggle to build a thriving nation and achieve the independent and peaceful reunification of the country under the banner of Songun.
					
					 Miguel Boieir, chairman of the Portugal-Korea Friendship Association, said that Kim Jong Il's start of the Songun revolutionary leadership on Aug. 25, 1960 marked the most meaningful occasion of historic significance in the accomplishment of the Korean people's cause of independence.
					
					 The recent military moves of the U.S. against the DPRK are extremely dangerous provocations harassing peace and security not only in the Korean Peninsula but in other parts of Northeast Asia and the rest of the world, he said, adding:
					
					 We are convinced that the Korean people will always emerge victorious in the struggle to resolutely foil the U.S. imperialists' aggression moves and realize the historic cause of national reunification as they are guided by the great Songun politics.

articles.title: Anniversary of Korea's Liberation Marked in Russia
articles.content:
Anniversary of Korea's Liberation Marked in Russia
 Pyongyang, August 18 (KCNA) -- A joint conference was held in Sankt-Peterburg of Russia on Aug. 8 on the occasion of the 65th anniversary of Korea's liberation.
					 Attending the conference were chiefs and members of organizations under the International Alliance of Societies for the Study of the Juche Idea and Songun Policy in East European and Central Asian Regions, including the All-Russian Society for the Study and Dissemination of Kimilsungism, the Association for the Promotion of the Study and Dissemination of Comrade Kim Jong Il's Works and the Women's Union Named after Kim Jong Suk, the Russian Youth Association for the Study of the Songun Policy, the Ukrainian "Treasured Sword of Songun" Association for the Study of the Juche Idea and the Belarusian February 16 Youth Association for the Study of the Juche Idea and the Songun Politics.
					
					 Panchenko, general secretary of the International Alliance of Societies for the Study of the Juche Idea and Songun Policy in East European and Central Asian Regions, in his report at the conference said that President Kim Il Sung founded the Juche idea, the Songun idea in "The Path of the Korean Revolution", a report made at the historic Kalun meeting in 1930.
					
					 The Korean revolution could make dynamic advance along the road of independence indicated by the Juche idea, the Songun idea since then, he said, adding:
					
					 The revolutionaries of Korea waged the 15-year long armed struggle, holding aloft the banner of independence under the leadership of Kim Il Sung, to defeat the Japanese imperialists and liberate the country.
					
					 Several personages made speeches at the conference under the titles of "The brave struggle of the Korean People's Revolutionary Army in East Asia, important factor of the victory in World War II", "War crimes committed by Japanese Samurais in Korea", etc.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Off Press in Russia
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Off Press in Russia
 Pyongyang, August 18 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il's work "Let Us Carry Out the Great Leader Comrade Kim Il Sung's Instructions for National Reunification" was brought out in pamphlet by the Khabarovskaya Krayevaya Tipografia Publishing House of Russia on the occasion of the 65th anniversary of Korea's liberation.
					 The work, published on August 4, Juche 86 (1997), deals with the undying feats performed by President Kim Il Sung for national reunification and formulates the three principles of national reunification, the 10-point programme of the great unity of the whole nation and the proposal for founding the Democratic Federal Republic of Koryo as the three charters for national reunification. And it indicates the tasks and ways for realizing the cause of national reunification based on the three charters.

articles.title: Bulletin Issued in Mexico
articles.content:
Bulletin Issued in Mexico
Pyongyang, August 18 (KCNA) -- The Mexican Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism released the 44th issue of its bulletin "Power of Independence".
					 The bulletin in an article under the sub-title of "The idea of independence" said it has been clarified by the Juche idea that independence is the most important attribute of man as a social being and human history is that of the struggle of the popular masses for independence.
					
					 The victory of the cause of independence of the popular masses and the cause of socialism and the prosperity of the country and the nation are guaranteed by arms, the article said, stressing that the Songun idea draws special attention of the international community today as it has embodied this principle.
					
					 The bulletin in another article sub-titled "Under the uplifted banner of independence" noted that the DPRK has made steady victorious progress under the uplifted banner of the Juche idea, the Songun idea.
					
					 The article said that the DPRK not only has defended socialism under the uplifted banner of Songun but brought about the historic turning point of building a thriving nation in the worst adversity in which the imperialist allied forces were getting ever-more desperate in their offensive against socialism by taking the advantage of the collapse of socialism in some countries toward the end of the last century.
					
					 The bulletin in another article under the sub-title of "The victory of the independent politics" informed the readers of the fact that the U.S. and its followers became ever-more undisguised in their anti-DPRK moves, pulling it up over its launch of satellite Kwangmyongsong-2 and the second underground nuclear test it carried out last year but it took resolute self-defensive measures. 
					
					 React to "sanctions" with retaliation and to "confrontation" with an all-out confrontation, this was the reply of the DPRK, the article said, adding:
					
					 The DPRK demonstrated that its declarations were not empty words on several occasions afterward. 
					
					 The reality in the DPRK clearly proved that independence is truth and the truth is sure to emerge victorious.

articles.title: Story of Kim Il Sung
articles.content:
Story of Kim Il Sung
 Pyongyang, August 18 (KCNA) -- On the evening of August 14, Juche 82 (1993), a day before the 48th anniversary of the liberation of the country, President Kim Il Sung watched a national art performance of kindergarteners as he promised before.
					 The children put on the stage songs and dances reflecting their happy life.
					
					 When the performance was over, the President asked officials whether all the children included in the program were present.
					
					 One of the officials replied that some children from a few kindergartens failed to come for some reason.
					
					 Lost in thought for a while, the President told the officials to take a measure for bringing the children along, though belatedly. He then said a promise with children should be kept without fail, otherwise it would give a serious impact on their mentality.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il vuelve a presenciar la comedia ligera "Eco de la montana"
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il vuelve a presenciar la comedia ligera "Eco de la montana"
						
Pyongyang, 18 de agosto (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, junto con los oficiales y los soldados del EPC presencio en el Gran Teatro de Hamhung la comedia ligera "Eco de la montana", obra laureada con el Premio Kim Il Sung, en gira por las localidades.
					Esta obra maestra de la epoca, que ensena la verdad de la vida mas profunda cada vez que la vea, tiene una fuerza atractiva tremenda que conquista el corazon de los hombres y pone de manifiesto el poder espiritual de ellos, subrayo el Dirigente y agrego que por eso, la obra resulta hoy intimo amigo y manual de la vida de nuestros militares y civiles.
					
					Recordo que los creadores y los artistas del Conjunto Dramatico Nacional han apoyado con fidelidad la politica del Partido en materia de la literatura y arte al crear y llevar a la escena en cada decada de la revolucion magnificas obras demandadas por la epoca. 
					
					Evaluo altamente las revolucionarias funciones artisticas ofrecidas por ellos y les agradecio en nombre del CC del PTC destacando que ellos estimulan activamente con la comedia ligera "Eco de la montana", obra monumental del autoctono arte dramatico del nuevo siglo, a nuestro ejercito y pueblo que se levantaron para acoger con elevado entusiasmo politico y brillantes exitos laborales el 65o aniversario de la fundacion del PTC y la Conferencia del Partido.
					
					Enfatizo que por su gran facultad conmovedora y valor cognoscitivo y educativo, las obras artistico-literarias de caracter revolucionario funcionan como poderoso medio de educacion para estimular energicamente a los militantes del partido y los trabajadores a la lucha y las proezas.
					
					Por ultimo, exhorto a los creadores y artistas a crear mucho mas obras maestras, tales como "Eco de la montana" que contribuye activamente a la movilizacion general de la fuerza espiritual de las masas, para dar inagotables fuerzas y coraje a nuestro ejercito y pueblo alzados a la gran causa de construccion de la gran potencia prospera.
					
					Acompanaron al Dirigente en esta ocasion el vicepresidente del CDN de la RPDC y jefe de departamento del CC del PTC, Jang Song Thaek, el secretario del CC del PTC, Kim Ki Nam, la jefa de departamento del CC del PTC, Kim Kyong Hui, y los jefes de departamento del CDN de la RPDC, Hyon Chol Hae y Ri Myong Su, el secretario responsable del Comite del PTC en la Provincia de Hamgyong del Sur, Kwak Pom Gi, y otros funcionarios directivos de esta provincia.

articles.title: MINREX se entrevista con ATCC en el tema de ejercicio military
articles.content:
MINREX se entrevista con ATCC en el tema de ejercicio military
						
Pyongyang, 18 de agosto (ATCC) -- En relacion con el despliegue en el Sur de Corea del ejercicio militar conjunto Estados Unidos-Sur de Corea "Ulji Freedom Guardian", el portavoz del Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea respondio el dia 18 a la Agencia Telegrafica Central de Corea como sigue:
					EE.UU. y las autoridades titeres surcoreanas libran desde el dia 16 el ejercicio militar conjunto "Ulji Freedom Guardian" de maxima dimension en la historia que persigue la meta mas belicosa que nunca. En menos de un mes, ellos ya habian desarrollado sucesivamente en los Mares Este y Oeste de Corea los otros ejercicios de guerra con denso olor a polvora. Seguidamente, despliegan ahora en toda la extension geografica surcoreana el citado ejercicio militar combinado, lo cual significa la peligrosisima provocacion militar encaminada a desatar, cueste lo que cueste, la guerra nuclear en la Peninsula Coreana.
					
					Estas maniobras militares devienen flagrante violacion del Acuerdo de Armisticio y acto totalmente contrariado a la declaracion presidencial del Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU fechada el 9 de julio de 2010 que demanda solucionar por via pacifica los problemas pendientes de la Peninsula Coreana mediante el dialogo y las negociaciones.
					
					Las provocaciones militares, que se cometen sucesivamente despreciando totalmente la preocupacion de la sociedad internacional por la agravacion de la tension en la Peninsula Coreana y su contorno, comprueban fehacientemente que EE.UU. es el que amenaza y destruye la paz y la seguridad del mundo.
					
					Los maniacos de guerra estan cavando imprudentemente sus propias tumbas.
					
					Estamos preparados tanto para el dialogo como para la guerra y disponemos de todos los medios y metodos para defender lo nuestro.
					
					La situacion actual nos hace sentir en carne propia la justeza y la vigencia de la politica de Songun.
					
					EE.UU. y las autoridades surcoreanas deben saber que la agravacion de la tension tambien tiene su limite y abandonar las pretensiones de eludir la responsabilidad de la explosion de la situacion.

articles.title: CNCDP denuncia ejercicios belicos anti-RPDC en Sur de Corea
articles.content:
CNCDP denuncia ejercicios belicos anti-RPDC en Sur de Corea 
						
Pyongyang, 18 de agosto (ATCC) -- El portavoz del Comite Nacional Coreano por la Defensa de la Paz (CNCDP) hizo publica el dia 18 una declaracion para denunciar a Estados Unidos y la banda de titeres surcoreanos que iniciaron por fin el ejercicio militar conjunto "Ulji Freedom Guardian" de caracter provocativo pese a la unanime condena y rechazo de toda la nacion coreana y los demas pueblos del mundo amantes de la paz.
					En el presente simulacro, que se desarrolla a partir del dia 16 hasta el 26 de agosto, se movilizan mas de 30 mil efectivos norteamericanos, tres veces mayor que en los tiempos anteriores, mas de 56 mil uniformados del ejercito titere surcoreano y mas de 400 mil civiles de mas de 4 mil organos, incluso las entidades autonomas centrales y locales, revela la nota y continua:
					
					EE.UU. y la banda de titeres surcoreanos ya habian desarrollado en los Mares Este y Oeste de Corea los ejercicios belicos anti-RPDC bajo el pretexto del incidente de hundimiento de la corbeta surcoreana. Seguidamente, despliegan freneticamente en toda la extension surcoreana el simulacro conjunto "Ulji Freedom Guardian", lo cual demuestra cuan enloquecidos estan ellos por desatar la guerra.
					
					El presente simulacro es el ensayo de guerra nuclear contra la RPDC, que se realiza segun el plan de operacion de ataque preventivo contra esta movilizando muchos equipos modernos de guerra y efectivos y combinando el tiro y el traslado en el clima de combate de verdad. 
					
					Sin embargo, los titeres surcoreanos lo describen con palabras ridiculas como "para disuadir la guerra y preservar la paz".
					
					Es una sofisteria hablar de la "paz" y de la "prevencion de la guerra" justamente cuando los titeres surcoreanos convirtieron todo el territorio surcoreano en el espacio de tiroteos y canonazos para atacar a los connacionales en contubernio con las fuerzas extranjeras. 
					
					Ensenaremos claramente a los belicistas que con ese ejercicio militar anti-RPDC, no van a ganar nada mas que la autodestruccion. 
					
					El ejercito y el pueblo de Corea no observaran nunca con brazos cruzados las provocaciones militares y las maniobras de guerra de los belicistas,  y como han declarado ya, daran un terrible golpe al baluarte de los enemigos en el cualquier momento y lugar imprevisibles.

articles.title: CRPP refuta discurso de Lee Myung Bak pronunciado por 15 de agosto
articles.content:
CRPP refuta discurso de Lee Myung Bak pronunciado por 15 de agosto
						
Pyongyang, 18 de agosto (ATCC) -- En relacion con que en su llamado "discurso conmemorativo del 15 de agosto" (dia de liberacion de Corea), el traidor Lee Myung Bak dijo unos chismes conflictivos y anti-reunificacion acusando a la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, el portavoz del Comite por la Reunificacion Pacifica de la Patria (CRPP) dio el dia 17 a la ATCC la siguiente respuesta:
					No cabe duda de que el "impuesto de la reunificacion" mencionado esta vez por el traidor Lee es un termino sumamente malsano que supone el "estado de emergencia del Norte" con que suenan absurda y vanamente los titeres surcoreanos.
					
					Los chismes conflictivos y anti-reunificacion de Lee revelan su intencion de eludir la responsabilidad de haber llevado al estado caotico las relaciones entre ambas partes coreanas y perseguir de continuo la infame politica de confrontacion consistente en la "desnuclearizacion, apertura y 3 000 dolares", siendo el sofisma antinacional que lleva al extremo la ya aguda situacion actual.
					
					La camarilla de titeres pronuncio esta vez unas palabras tan cinicas y repugnantes, tales como la "reunificacion pacifica" y la "comunidad" librando fanaticamente por otra parte en contubernio con EE.UU. el "Ulji Freedom Guardian" y otros macro-ejercicios de guerra de agresion contra la RPDC. Por eso, tales palabras no pasan de ser un truco torpe para ocultar el atributo belicoso de ellos y enganar la opinion publica interna y externa.
					
					Para colmo, el traidor Lee abogo por el "cambio del Norte" vinculando con la RPDC el ya desgastado caso de hundimiento de la corbeta surcoreana. Esto deviene una insoportable provocacion a la RPDC y la expresion de la siniestra intencion de la horda de traidores surcoreanos de perseguir hasta el final el enfrentamiento y la guerra.
					
					Es ridiculizado dentro y fuera del pais el "impuesto de la reunificacion" planteado por el traidor Lee justamente cuando la situacion esta tan tirante que puede dar lugar a la guerra hoy o manana. Es que esa palabra la puede decir solo el politico imbecil, que no sabe como marcha el mundo ni que es la reunificacion debido a su ignorancia de las relaciones intercoreanas, y el especulador que piensa que se resuelve lo todo con el dinero.
					
					Es totalmente absurda tambien la palabra "comunidad" porque la camarilla surcoreana habla de la "comunidad en paz" librando casi todos los dias los ejercicios de guerra contra la RPDC, aboga por la "comunidad economica" sofocando los proyectos de cooperacion N-S y demanda la "comunidad nacional" negando las declaraciones conjuntas Norte-Sur e impidiendo la reunificacion.
					
					Ella presenta la "renuncia nuclear" de alguien como premisa de las relaciones Norte-Sur y la reunificacion en su ridiculo intento de desarmar y agredir a la RPDC con EE.UU. A esto se llama la gran absurdidad igual a esperar el derrumbe del cielo.
					
					Las peroratas del traidor resultan para la RPDC la declaracion de confrontacion total entre los regimenes.
					
					Al decirlas, el traidor Lee mostro por si solo que el es responsable principal de la quiebra total de las relaciones N-S y de la actual situacion al borde de guerra.
					
					El pagara muy caro su disparate del "impuesto de la reunificacion", anotado en el texto de su discurso y pronunciado por si mismo.
					
					Le convendria mas ocuparse de los asuntos de su casa a punto de arruinarse en lugar de abrigar la absurda ambicion de atentar el regimen ajeno.
					
					Si la banda traidora marcha hasta el final por el camino de enfrentamiento, la RPDC tambien saldra a su encuentro.

articles.title: Nuevos procesos productivos del Complejo de Maquinaria de Ryongsong
articles.content:
Nuevos procesos productivos del Complejo de Maquinaria de Ryongsong 
Pyongyang, 18 de agosto (ATCC) -- El dia 17, en el Complejo de Maquinaria de Ryongsong quedaron inaugurados nuevamente la Fabrica de Hierro Fundido Songun cuyo proceso productivo es computerizado desde el suministro de materias primas hasta la mezcla de arena, el amoldamiento, la fusion y el desareno, y el taller de compresor Songun que dispone de suficientes instalaciones de tecnologia CNC.
					Tales exitos posibilitan al Complejo de Maquinaria de Ryongsong, magna base de produccion de maquinas, registrar un nuevo viraje en la fundicion y en la produccion de compresores y, al mismo tiempo, liberar completamente a los obreros de los trabajos dificiles y duros aun economizando la mano de obra y disminuyendo el consumo de electricidad, y asegurar en el maximo nivel la cultura laboral.
					
					En la ceremonia inaugural participaron el presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema Kim Yong Nam, los vicepremieres del Consejo de Ministros Kim Rak Hui, Jon Ha Chol, Kang Nung Su, Pak Su Gil, Jo Pyong Ju y Han Kwang Bok, los funcionarios correspondientes, trabajadores y empleados de la empresa. 
					
					Fue transmitido el mensaje de agradecimiento del Dirigente Kim Jong Il a los funcionarios y los obreros del citado complejo quienes hicieron aporte a la construccion de los nuevos procesos productivos arriba mencionados. 
					
					El secretario responsable del Comite del PTC en la Provincia de Hamgyong del Sur, Kwak Pom Gi, hizo uso de la palabra inaugural.
